## About
Ben Meredith writes books that help people—at work, at home, and in the things that matter most. He has spent years in WordPress, support operations, and technology leadership. He speaks at events like Support Driven Summit and cares about sustainable ways to help people and teams. He is a husband and father of three boys, lives in rural South Carolina, and is often singing, teaching, or cheering on the Tar Heels.
